author: Erik_
title: Great value and lots of fun.
review:
As PurpleBrick mentioned this is a great set. We got this set for my 2 year old daughter, while travelling abroad. The most interesting part for her in this set, was the Cat and the Horse and the little figures.

I also like the walls and the roof of the set, to build largers constructions.

PS. While my daughter was just 2 years old, I did not give her the smaller pieces, like the windows, the cup and the carrot.
